name: Black Diamond
note: Believed to be the largest Indian elephant in captivity.

name: Isilo
note: One of South Africa’s largest Africans and the largest living tusker (a male elephant with tusks weighing over 100 pounds) in the southern hemisphere before his death.

name: Mona
note: Thought, at 60, to have been the oldest Asian in the United States.

name: Tai
note: Known for featuring in the films Larger than Life and Water for Elephants.

name: John L. Sullivan
note: A boxing elephant in Adam Forepaugh's circus.

name: Abul-Abbas
note: An elephant given to Carolingian emperor Charlemagne by the Abbasid caliph Harun al-Rashid.
